## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 3 HORIZONTAL PLUS HOME Der kleine und platzsparende Hochdruckreiniger K 3 Horizontal Plus Home eignet sich ideal für die Reinigung von Gartenflächen und -möbeln, Terrassen und Autos. Inkl. Home Kit. ## Description The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components: 1. **Main Unit**: - A compact, rectangular pressure washer in yellow and black. - It has a handle on top for portability. - The front features a vented design with a logo. 2. **Accessories**: - **Spray Gun**: A black handheld spray gun with a trigger. - **Lances**: Two different lances for varied pressure settings. - One lance has a straight nozzle. - The other has a rotating nozzle for more intense cleaning. - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular yellow attachment designed for cleaning flat surfaces like patios or driveways. - **Hose**: A coiled black hose for water supply. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, likely for use with the pressure washer. The set is designed for efficient cleaning of outdoor surfaces, vehicles, and other items requiring high-pressure water cleaning. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes a large numeral "1" in a light gray color, which serves as a background element. Overlaid on this numeral is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the following text is prominently displayed in black, uppercase letters: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND** This text suggests a claim of being the top brand globally in the category of pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold colors and large fonts emphasizes the importance and confidence of the statement. ## Description The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a power button or a circular shape with an arrow pointing upwards. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in white. The overall appearance suggests a theme of energy or power enhancement. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a yellow background with black elements. The main visual element is a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is depicted with a plus sign (+) and a minus sign (-) above it, indicating adjustable power settings. Below the nozzle, there is a horizontal line, suggesting the surface being cleaned. The overall design implies that the device allows for variable power control, likely for a pressure washer or similar equipment. ## Bestell Nr. 1.602-824.0 - Praktische Zubehöraufbewahrung. - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel. ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529078179
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 120
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1600
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 3,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 7,3
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 380 × 197 × 264
## Ausstattung
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 1, Reinigungsmittel Patio & Deck, 0.5 l
Strahlrohrverlängerung [ ]
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 5
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
Kabelaufwicklung [ ]
## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." The logo features the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 3 HORIZONTAL PLUS HOME

Der kleine und platzsparende Hochdruckreiniger K 3 Horizontal Plus Home eignet sich ideal für die Reinigung von Gartenflächen und -möbeln, Terrassen und Autos. Inkl. Home Kit.

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Main Unit**: 
   - A compact, rectangular pressure washer in yellow and black. 
   - It has a handle on top for portability.
   - The front features a vented design with a logo.

2. **Accessories**:
   - **Spray Gun**: A black handheld spray gun with a trigger.
   - **Lances**: Two different lances for varied pressure settings.
     - One lance has a straight nozzle.
     - The other has a rotating nozzle for more intense cleaning.
   - **Surface Cleaner**: A circular yellow attachment designed for cleaning flat surfaces like patios or driveways.
   - **Hose**: A coiled black hose for water supply.
   - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, likely for use with the pressure washer.

The set is designed for efficient cleaning of outdoor surfaces, vehicles, and other items requiring high-pressure water cleaning.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, featuring a bold, attention-grabbing design. It includes a large numeral "1" in a light gray color, which serves as a background element. Overlaid on this numeral is a bright yellow arrow shape pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the following text is prominently displayed in black, uppercase letters:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND**

This text suggests a claim of being the top brand globally in the category of pre-sliced sandwich products. The use of bold colors and large fonts emphasizes the importance and confidence of the statement.

## Description

The image is a logo or symbol with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized design that resembles a power button or a circular shape with an arrow pointing upwards. Below the design, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in white. The overall appearance suggests a theme of energy or power enhancement.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a yellow background with black elements. The main visual element is a stylized representation of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is depicted with a plus sign (+) and a minus sign (-) above it, indicating adjustable power settings. Below the nozzle, there is a horizontal line, suggesting the surface being cleaned. The overall design implies that the device allows for variable power control, likely for a pressure washer or similar equipment.

## Bestell Nr.

1.602-824.0

- Praktische Zubehöraufbewahrung.
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel.

## Technische Daten

Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 120
Fördermenge l/h max. 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25

Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb

Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 7,3
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 380 × 197 × 264

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with the text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" around the top and a star symbol in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, white, and gold. This badge signifies that the holder has achieved a world record recognized by Guinness World Records.
